author: gstein
msg: Stop generating the delimiter table. We only have two of them: one for
EBCDIC, and one for ASCII. Just encode those directly into apr_uri.c.
(uri_delims[]): insert two copies of this table. reformatted a bit from
the old table (each row is sixteen entries now, for easy hex mapping).
select the table based on APR_CHARSET_EBCDIC.

author: gstein
msg: New build.conf for apr-util. The new gen-build.py script has a notion of
subdirectories which contain per-platform subdirs. apr-util is platform
independent, so it doesn't have any, but we still want to include an empty
Also added some comments to clarify the options.
